channel.title: Blender on particl3s.xyz
channel.description: Recent content in Blender on particl3s.xyz

item.title: Obsolete
item.description: Since the latest edition support has been discontinued for older pc. The software no longer supports my age old machine. As a new direction I’ll be working on animation on a regular basis from now on, back to basics.

item.title: Reference
item.description: From now on this here subset in recess has dedication outlined to keeping up to date on personal projects, w.i.ps and so on.
